name: John Doe
message: Not so cool. Been off for a while nowðŸ¤®

name: John Doe
message: I went to your place last night and you were not around. I was told you went to the hospital

name: John Doe
message: Oh! I was not feeling too well. I had to go to the hospital

name: John Doe
message: I was diagnosed with malaria and typhoid. I was given some drugs to take and I was told to come back for checkup in 2 days time

name: John Doe
message: Oh! Sorry about that. I hope you are feeling better now?

name: John Doe
message: Yes, I am. I am feeling much better now. I am just taking the drugs I was given and I am also eating well. I am also taking a lot of water too.
